abstract: The new agency advises companies on philanthropic efforts variously known as cause marketing, social impact marketing and corporate social responsibility.
snippet: The new agency advises companies on philanthropic efforts variously known as cause marketing, social impact marketing and corporate social responsibility.
lead_paragraph: THE Pepsi Refresh Project awarded more than $20 million to about 1,000 projects in 2010, with grant seekers promoting their causes on the Pepsi Web site and on Facebook, and consumers deciding who received the money by voting online. Now in its second year, Pepsi Refresh has been heralded as the fifth best social-media campaign by Forbes magazine.

headline.main: Good/Corps Aims to Help Business Meet Social Goals
